mapper.select:
select
from t_data_risk where 1=1
AND industry like concat('%',#{industry},'%')
AND enterprise_name like concat('%',#{enterpriseName},'%')
AND rectification_progress like concat('%',#{rectificationProgress},'%')
AND discovery_date >= #{startTime}
AND discovery_date <= #{endTime}

insert into t_data_risk (industry, enterprise_name, discovery_date, dangers_type, dangers_sources, dangers_details, rectification_measures, rectification_date, regulatory_department, responsible_person, responsible_person_phone, rectification_progress, is_case, is_appointment, is_fine, is_exposure, is_rectification, is_close, is_transfer) values
( #{item.industry}, #{item.enterpriseName}, #{item.discoveryDate}, #{item.dangersType}, #{item.dangersSources}, #{item.dangersDetails}, #{item.rectificationMeasures}, #{item.rectificationDate}, #{item.regulatoryDepartment}, #{item.responsiblePerson}, #{item.responsiblePersonPhone}, #{item.rectificationProgress}, #{item.isCase}, #{item.isAppointment}, #{item.isFine}, #{item.isExposure}, #{item.isRectification}, #{item.isClose}, #{item.isTransfer} )

update t_data_risk
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discovery_date = #{discoveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dangers_type = #{dangersType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dangers_sources = #{dangersSources,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dangers_details = #{dangersDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rectification_measures = #{rectificationMeasures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

rectification_progress = #{rectificationProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

is_appointment = #{isAppointment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

is_rectification = #{isRectification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
